item.description:
Don't miss our special Halloween Tykes/Little Family Yoga Meetup!

Get into the spirit of the season and join us for a memorable Halloween Yoga event. Costumes welcome but optional.

TYKE / LITTLE FAMILY Itsy Bitsy Yoga (Sibling) Class (for kids age 2- almost 5; younger siblings welcome)

Description: Tykes Itsy Bitsy Yoga combines unique toddler-friendly yoga poses with songs, stories, and games to create an enriching parent/child activity. Tyke will learn yoga through social interaction, repetition, and play. Tykes also learn how to relieve frustration, improve motor skills, and increase attention span by actively following directions. Help your tyke build the foundation for a healthy and fit lifestyle while having fun! No yoga experience is required.
Thank you for arranging just 1 parent/caregiver per family.

Younger Siblings are welcome to join. Sibs over 12 months are $8 extra, under 12 months and they can come for FREE!

Next Weekend Tykes IBY Meetup Time: Saturday, Oct 15, 11:15am-12:05pm
Cost: $15 includes 1 parent+1 child. (pre-payment required w/ YES RSVP). . Younger siblings over 12 mos. $8 extra, payable at event.
A single YES RSVP will include you and your child. (Do not list +1 unless you are RSVP'ing for a 2nd family as you'll be charged twice.)


About Us: Weekend IBY Meetup classes are taught by Alexandra De Collibus, Certified Itsy Bitsy Yoga Facilitator and Director of Absolute Yoga in Hopkinton, MA. Alexandra has offered IBY classes under the name Sweet Pea Yoga since 2003 and has taught hundreds of pint-sized yogis across MA and RI. Learn more at www.SweetPeaYoga.com
Itsy Bitsy Yoga was created by Helen Garabedian, an Infant Developmental Movement Educator, yoga teacher, and mother. Learn more at www.ItsyBitsyYoga.com
item.name: Halloween TYKES Itsy Bitsy Yoga Meetup (Oct)
